item.description:
Come. Play. Have fun.

  • Please note your rating in your profile, so that we can match up more evenly. See http://tennis.meetup....
  • Please rsvp either way, and esp. if you're planning to come.
  • We usually play for 3 hours, from 5:00-8:00pm.
  • Come when you can. The courts (5) are lighted.
  • Will reschedule if it rains (maybe to Thursday or Friday).
  • Note: the location has been changed to Watertown because Lexington stopped lighting their courts (on Oct. 1).
item.name: Tennis Wednesday Night - Watertown
